name: Teleport
description: Teleport is a web3 social platform for users to create and share immersive experiences with their non-fungible tokens (NFTs) in augmented reality and in portals. Teleport Portals are digital gateways to create virtual spaces like metaverses, games, art galleries, conference centers, e-commerce stores, real world locations, live events and much more. PORT tokens are used throughout the Teleport ecosystem as the basis of transactions and interactions.
